text: 1568 (MDLXVIII) was a leap year starting on Thursday in the Julian calendar and a leap year starting on Monday in the proleptic Gregorian calendar. ==Events== *January 16 - Álvaro de Mendaña discovers the Tuvaluan island of Nui. *Unknown - The Eighty Years War begins. ==Births== * March 9 - Aloysius Gonzaga, Italian saint (d. 1591) * April 5 - Pope Urban VIII, 236th Pope (d. 1644) * Unknown - Joris van Spilbergen, Dutch explorer (d. 1620) ==Deaths== * January 26 - Lady Katherine Grey, English noblewoman (b. 1540) * July 24 - Carlos, Prince of Asturias, oldest son of Philip II of Spain (b. 1545) * December 31 – Shimazu Tadayoshi, Japanese daimyo (b. 1493)
